body_html:
Apart from having a single package, TF used to operate like this.
I do not remember why we switched.

The above means this is feasible. But it will definitely be an intrusive change. And I also remember multiple github issues about this.

This is eventually in our plans to implement, but if someone from the community is willing to take a stab, I would be happy to review the change.

body:
Apart from having a single package, TF used to operate like this.
I do not remember why we switched.

The above means this is feasible. But it will definitely be an intrusive change. And I also remember multiple github issues about this.

This is eventually in our plans to implement, but if someone from the community is willing to take a stab, I would be happy to review the change.
